name: Goatie's Halloween Adventure
description:
It's almost Halloween!

Collect souls and light the magic Jack-o-lantern to help Goatie prepare for his big night. Learn spells from arcane tomes to protect yourself and to use magic goatly mid-air abilities.

10 levels of goat-stompin' fun.

  • W, Z, Space, up: Jump
  • Doublejump: Use power
  • A/D, arrow keys: Left/Right
  • F4: Fullscreen
  • M: Mute
  • R: Restart level
  • ESC: Pause

Made in a week, by myself and a bunch of free art assets. There is a lot of really simple details its still missing while others parts of the game have a disproportionate amount of polish. I had to gut a lot of planned features to get this to bare minimum playable state.
